column8: *two deaths not lab confirmed.  Negative: Patient negative based on testing performed at Public Health Ontario (PHO) Laboratory and non-Public Health Ontario laboratories.  Currently under investigation: Test results are pending.  Confirmed positive: Patient still testing positive and has not had two consecutive negative results greater than 24 hours apart.  Resolved: Patient is no longer infectious based on two consecutive negative tests performed at PHO Laboratory at least 24 hours apart
